title: The Olympia marathon sequence
brief_description: Excerpts from the English version of the 1936 German motion picture entitled “Olympia” directed by Leni Riefenstahl. Edited and released in the United States by Phoenix Films, 1973. Presents highlights from the marathon competition at the 1936 Olympic Games in Berlin, Germany.
